keys: cartões de cumprimento escritos da expressão
tarjetas de saludo escritas de la expresión
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3218</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Remembering September 11th -greeting cards</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erinnern September 11. - an Grußkarten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se rappeler du 11 des cartes de salutation 
septembre -</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recordando cartões de cumprimento setembro de 11o
-</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricordarsi del 11 delle cartoline d'auguri 
settembre -</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θυσμένος την 11η Σεπτεμβρίου - κάρτες χαιρετισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recordar tarjetas de saludo de septiembre del 11 
-</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These are greeting cards expressing condolences to the American people prepared by children in a 6th grade English class.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tragedy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression greeting cards</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">America</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese sind die Grußkarten, die Beileid zu den 
amerikanischen Leuten ausdrücken, die von den Kindern in einer 
englischen Kategorie des 6. Grades vorbereitet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce sont des cartes de salutation exprimant des 
condoléances aux  américains préparés par des enfants en classe 
anglaise de la 6ème catégorie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes são cartões de cumprimento que expressam 
condolences aos povos americanos preparados por crianças em uma 
classe inglesa da ã classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste sono cartoline d'auguri che esprimono le 
condoglianze alla gente americana preparata dai bambini in un codice 
categoria inglese del sesto grado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές είναι κάρτες χαιρετισμού εκφράζοντας τα 
συλληπητήρια στους αμερικανικούς ανθρώπους που προετοιμάζονται 
από τα παιδιά σε μια 6η αγγλική κλάση βαθμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éstas son tarjetas de saludo que expresan 
condolencias a la gente americana preparada por los niños en una 
clase inglesa del 6to grado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tragödie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftliche Ausdruck Grußkarten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amerika</string>
          </keyword>
